Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.model

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.model.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Chronus, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hera, Hestia, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus
public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
Generic abstract class for Gods Cards. It implements all the methods that Player needs to use like move and build.

This class has to be extended for each God and lots of method should be override to provide the correct behaviour of each God.
Each method of this class implements the standard rules of the game, not modified by the God Powers.

To define what action is valid or not, the methods analise the Island and the moves that any Player can do (accessing to BoardManager object in Player).

  • Method Details

    • placeWorker

      public void placeWorker​(Worker worker, int desiredX, int desiredY, Island island) throws InvalidMovementException
      Place a Worker at the beginning of the match in the desired coordinated.
      Parameters:
      worker - A worker of the actual player
      desiredX - X Position where the player wants to place the worker
      desiredY - Y Position where the player wants to place the worker
      island - The current board of game
      Throws:
      InvalidMovementException - Exception thrown when the coordinates are not valid, or the behaviour of the player block this action

    • move

      public void move​(Worker worker, int desiredX, int desiredY, Island island) throws InvalidMovementException, WinningException
      Move a Worker from his actual position to the desired coordinates.
      Parameters:
      worker - A worker of the actual player
      desiredX - X Position where the player wants to move the worker
      desiredY - Y Position where the player wants to move the worker
      island - The current board of game
      Throws:
      InvalidMovementException - Exception thrown when the coordinates are not valid
      WinningException - If the player won, throw a WinningException

    • build

      public void build​(Worker worker, BlockTypeEnum block, int desiredX, int desiredY, Island island) throws InvalidBuildException
      Build a block, near a Worker, in the the desired coordinates.
      Parameters:
      worker - A worker of the actual player
      block - level of block desired to build
      desiredX - X Position where the player wants to build the block
      desiredY - Y Position where the player wants to build the block
      island - The current board of game
      Throws:
      InvalidBuildException - Exception thrown when the coordinates are not valid, or the behaviour of the player block this action

    • isValidDestination

      protected boolean isValidDestination​(int actualX, int actualY, int desiredX, int desiredY, Island island)
      Check if the destination is reachable from the actual position of the Worker.
      Parameters:
      actualX - Actual X Position of the worker
      actualY - Actual Y Position of the worker
      desiredX - X Position where the player wants to place the worker
      desiredY - Y Position where the player wants to place the worker
      island - The current board of game
      Returns:
      true when the destination is reachable from the actual position, false otherwise

      protected boolean isValidWorkerPlacement​(Worker worker, int desiredX, int desiredY, Island island) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Check if the desired location is free and not complete for a Worker Placement.
      Parameters:
      worker - A worker of the actual player
      desiredX - X Position where the player wants to place the worker
      desiredY - Y Position where the player wants to place the worker
      island - The current board of game
      Returns:
      true if the the desired location is free and not complete, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • isValidConstruction

      protected boolean isValidConstruction​(BlockTypeEnum block, int actualX, int actualY, int desiredX, int desiredY, Island island) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Check if the construction can be done from the actual position of the Worker.
      Parameters:
      block - level of construction Player wants to build
      actualX - Actual X Position of the worker
      actualY - Actual Y Position of the worker
      desiredX - X Position where the player wants to place the worker
      desiredY - Y Position where the player wants to place the worker
      island - The current board of game
      Returns:
      true when the construction can be done from the actual position, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the indexes of the desired position aren't valid.

    • isValidBlockPlacement

      protected boolean isValidBlockPlacement​(BlockTypeEnum block, int[] desiredConstruction, BehaviourManager behaviour)
      Check if the desired block can be added to the selected CellCluster.
      Parameters:
      block - level of construction Player wants to build
      desiredConstruction - Array of int that represent the current CellCluster with the addition of the desired block
      behaviour - behaviour of the Card
      Returns:
      true if the block order and placement is valid, false otherwise

    • distance

      public double distance​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Calculate the Euclidean distance between two given cells.
      Parameters:
      x1 - Coordinate X of first Cell
      y1 - Coordinate X of first Cell
      x2 - Coordinate X of first Cell
      y2 - Coordinate X of first Cell
      Returns:
      Value of Euclidean distance between the two cells

    • checkWorkerPosition

      protected boolean checkWorkerPosition​(Island island, Worker worker, int x, int y)
      The checkWorkerPosition method check if the selected Worker is one the selected CellCluster
      Parameters:
      island - The current board of game
      worker - The Worker is needed to check the position
      x - The X Coordinate where the Worker should be
      y - The y Coordinate where the Worker should be
      Returns:
      true if the Worker is on the right position, false if the CellCluster doesn't have a player on Top or the position of worker is different.

    • checkBlockPosition

      protected boolean checkBlockPosition​(Island island, BlockTypeEnum block, int x, int y, int[] oldCellCluster)
      NOT IMPLEMENTED - The checkBlockPosition method check if the selected block is one the right place in the right CellCluster.
      Parameters:
      island - The current board of game
      block - The block is needed to check the position
      x - The X Coordinate where the block should be
      y - The Y Coordinate where the block should be
      oldCellCluster - The CellCluster before the building of the block
      Returns:
      true if the block is on the right position, false otherwise

    • checkWin

      protected void checkWin​(Island island, int x, int y, int oldAltitudeOfPlayer) throws WinningException
      The checkWin method throw a new WinningException when the Worker reach the 3th Level.
      Parameters:
      island - The current board of game
      x - The X Coordinate where the Worker is
      y - The y Coordinate where the Worker is
      oldAltitudeOfPlayer - The altitude of worker before the move
      Throws:
      WinningException - The WinningException is thrown when the Player triggered one of the Win check

    • getName

      public CardEnum getName()
      Return the Name of this card as CardEnum.
      Returns:
      The Name of this card as CardEnum.
